Changes:

2012-12-28:
-----------
 * added a simple implementation of HFD5 output

2011-11-03:
-----------
 * fixed a bug in the conversion from matrix to string list
 * version 0.4
 * added export format CSVlocale

2011-09-06:
-----------
 * changed script name DyMatExport to DyMatExport.py
 * added __getitem__ to DyMatFile
 * more documentation
